rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Garage Access
rooms.description: Serves as the entrance with direct access to a two-car garage. The space is designed with minimalist style using clean lines and neutral colors.

rooms.name: Open Plan Kitchen-Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious, open-plan area combining kitchen and living room to facilitate social interaction. The layout adheres to minimalist design principles with integrated cabinetry and hidden appliances.

rooms.name: Utility Area
rooms.description: Serves as a service area for kitchen and storage including pantry. The design focuses on functionality while maintaining aesthetic minimalism.

openings.description: Main entrance door ensuring seamless transition from exterior to interior. Aligns with Vastu principles by facing the east or north side.
Large windows providing ample natural light and ventilation. Positioned to balance energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.

garden_access.description: The villa is designed with a large garden area accessible from multiple sides, promoting a seamless connection between indoor and outdoor living spaces, in line with minimalist and natural design principles.

garage.description: Dedicated two-car garage integrated into the ground floor. Entrance from the front is aligned with Vastu orientation to promote positive energy flow.
